Description: Weighted composite score based on ability to avoid mild, moderate, and severe harm
Percent of cases where all highly appropriate actions were recommended
Percent of uncertain and unnecessary interventions avoided
Percent of emergencies that were correctly recognized
Percent of urgent specialist referrals that were correctly recognized
Total number of severely harmful recommendations over 100 patient cases
